title: Dumb Warnings
content:
[http://www.dumbwarnings.com/warnings.php?site=warnings](http://web.archive.org/web/20071116161733/http:/www.dumbwarnings.com/warnings.php?site=warnings "http://www.dumbwarnings.com/warnings.php?site=warnings")

Warning: Contents might be hot

 [‹ non-lining number spacing in Perpetua](http://web.archive.org/web/20071116161733/http:/typophile.com/node/20769 "Go to previous forum topic") [Typography t-shirts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071116161733/http:/typophile.com/node/19019 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Dan Weaver

comments.content:
Classic.

I once had to put at the bottom of an ad:  
Artists, date and venue are subject to change.

I don’t know exactly what’s left…

peace

We also put an exhortation on tickets for punk rock shows that said:

Be nice.

It made the LA Times…

peace
